Monitor your heart rate %1$d hours a day. The green indicator of the heart rate sensor will flash intermittently. For accurate results, please tighten the watch and keep it at least one finger\'s width away from the carpal bones.

Adopts the sleep monitoring technology of HUAWEI TruSleep™, which can accurately analyse deep sleep, light sleep, REM sleep, and waking, to provide you with sleep quality evaluations and recommendations authorised by the Center for Dynamical Biomarkers (DBIOM) at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, a major teaching hospital of Harvard Medical School.
Your app logs will be uploaded to the server for the sole purpose of analysing and optimising this app. Thank you for your support.
General statistical data about how you use Huawei Wear may be collected in order to help us improve our products and services.
General statistical data about how you use Huawei Wear will be collected in order to help us improve our products and services.
You are using mobile data, which may incur data charges. It is recommended that you switch to Wi-Fi.

Your band is connected to another device. Exit Huawei Wear on that device and try again.

Please restart your %1$s, turn your phone\'s Bluetooth off and on, and then try again.

Enabling TruSleep will activate the heart rate sensor during sleep, which will increase battery usage. Exact battery life will depend on usage during the night.

Huawei/Honor wearable devices adopt the sleep monitoring technology of HUAWEI TruSleep™, which can accurately analyse various stages of sleep, including deep sleep, light sleep, REM sleep, and waking to help you obtain sleep quality evaluations and recommendations authorised by the Center for Dynamical Biomarkers (DBIOM) at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, a major teaching hospital of Harvard Medical School.
Certified by the Center for Dynamical Biomarkers (DBIOM) at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, a major teaching hospital of Harvard Medical School

When the Bluetooth icon begins to flash, touch START to pair.

If the LED light on the left side of the headset flashes, proceed to the next step. If not, press and hold the volume + and volume - buttons for 2 seconds until the LED light flashes. Then proceed to the next step.
You need to use Android Wear to pair your phone and watch.
Retrieve fitness and health data from wearable device
Please download and install Android Wear from GooglePlay, then pair with your Huawei Watch.
Huawei Wear has transferred your fitness and health data to the Huawei Health app. You can see all of your data in Huawei Health and store your data on Huawei cloud.

When enabled, notifications will be pushed to your wearable device. When you are asleep or Do not disturb is enabled, notifications will be pushed but the device will not vibrate.

Restart your earphones and the indicator light will begin to flash
In the Bluetooth interface under Settings, select AM - R1 to pair

Current Huawei Health version is outdated, some features may not display properly. Please install the latest Huawei Health.

Huawei Wear provides device management. Other functions (including phone pedometer, fitness and health data analysis, trajectories, training plans, third-party services, achievements, online activities, and leader boards) have transferred to Huawei Health. To use the above features, download the Huawei Health app.

Huawei Wear covers device management. Other functions (including phone pedometer, fitness and health data analysis, trajectories, training plans, and third-party services) have been moved to Huawei Health. To use the above features, please download the Huawei Health app.
No network connection. Touch to try again.
Huawei Wear has transferred services such as fitness and health data analysis to Huawei Health.
Huawei Health provides services such as professional fitness and health data analysis. Please install the latest version of Huawei Health.
Your fitness, sleep, and heart rate data will sync to Huawei Health through a secure channel.

Please wear the earphones and touch to try again
Regular sleeping patterns are beneficial to your health.
Huawei Wear needs to enable location services to provide you with weather push notifications. Enable?
The membership service is only available to Huawei device users.

In order to provide better services when you use Huawei Wear, this app may collect information about your device and system, and personal data including user information, fitness records, sleep data, heart rate, location, and contacts. Any information we collect will remain confidential, and we will take the utmost care to protect your privacy.
You will be notified when your personal data is synced to the cloud for the first time. You can stop the sync or delete your personal data from the cloud at any time.

Huawei Wear is an app for collecting and managing fitness and health data. To help you manage your Huawei Wear device, and to track and show your fitness activities and sleep patterns, the following information will be collected and processed:

Huawei Wear is an app for managing Huawei wearable devices. Huawei Health is an app that provides professional fitness and health services. Huawei Wear will collect the following information to manage your wearable device and provide professional fitness and health services through Huawei Health:
Your fitness data, sleep data, heart rate, location and contacts
Your fitness data, sleep data, heart rate, location, and contacts
Data about the device and system (band MAC)
Personal data that you have provided (name, nickname, height, weight, birthday, fitness target)
Personal data that you have provided (nickname, gender, birthday, height, weight, fitness target)
You can uninstall the app to terminate data collection and uploading. You can also use the Privacy Settings of your mobile app to control data sharing.
If you are located in Europe, your data will be stored in the EU.
Uninstall the app to terminate data collection, or change the settings in the Huawei Health app to control data sharing.
By touching AGREE, you agree to the %1$s and acknowledge that you have read the %2$s, which includes information about your data subject rights.
Huawei sports heart rate Bluetooth earphones
Huawei sports heart rate Bluetooth earphones R1 Pro
Copyright © %1$s-%2$s Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.
1. Enable GPS to use automatic tracking\n2. Automatic tracking will drain your battery more quickly

Get a Huawei %1$s, enjoy exclusive services
In addition to the 1-year factory warranty, you can also enjoy an additional 3-month extended warranty.

If you experience any issues with your watch and the warranty is still valid, log in to Huawei\'s official website or call the customer service hotline. Relevant watch delivery fees are covered by the warranty.
HUAWEI ID login session has expired. Please log in again.
Use new device to receive more benefits
Conduct an MMI test on your watch for a comprehensive check to determine whether there are hardware failures.
1. Gold members can enjoy two free maintenance service sessions at a Huawei store.
2. Users can choose one or more maintenance items for each session. Regardless of how many items the user chooses, each visit will be counted as 1 maintenance service session only.
Check the app version on the user\'s watch. If it is not the latest version, update it to the latest version.
Clean watch body (not including leather strap) and screen without disassembling the watch.
If your watch is damaged (such as drop or water damage) within one month of purchase, you can enjoy 1 free maintenance service session at a Huawei franchise store.
Use trajectory to record your active lifestyle

Your %1$s account does not match your phone\'s HUAWEI ID. Switch to your HUAWEI ID for normal use. While switching accounts, data will automatically transfer. Data transfer will be completed within %2$s and will not affect your use.

Your %1$s and %2$s accounts do not match, switch to matching accounts for normal use. While switching accounts, data will automatically transfer. Data transfer will be completed within %3$s and will not affect your use.

If the history of %1$s has been lost, you may have used WeChat, QQ, Weibo or other third-party accounts for authentication on an older version. You can retrieve the history by logging in with the third-party account for authentication again.

Update to improve your band\'s positioning speed and accuracy
Ephemeris data provides information on the orbital status of navigation satellites. Update your wearable\'s ephemeris data for faster and more accurate location tracking.
For more accurate positioning, check for updates before beginning an outdoor run or cycle.

In order to provide more professional fitness services, all fitness services will be provided by Huawei Health from now on, while Huawei Wear will focus on wearable device management. Please install Huawei Health when prompted. Your fitness data will be sent to the Huawei Health app automatically the first time you launch Huawei Health. You can go to Huawei Health to manage your previous and new fitness data, which will be stored only on your smartphone. Fitness data in the cloud will be deleted.
Pair your %1$s in Huawei Health to manage the device and view data. Go to Huawei Health to pair?
Huawei Health now does everything that Huawei Wear can. You can use it to pair your %1$s and manage all your devices and data in one place. Go to Huawei Health to pair?
Pair your %1$s in Huawei Health to manage your device, access services, and check fitness data. Go to Huawei Health?
%2$s can now be paired and managed in %1$s. To pair your band, go to %3$s.
If you continue pairing in %1$s, all wearable devices will be unpaired in %2$s. Continue?
All wearable devices will be unpaired in Huawei Health. Continue?

Set up an eSIM card to allow the watch to communicate independently

eSIM is an electronic SIM card service provided by carriers, which helps build cellular networks for your watch. With eSIM, messages, phone calls, and Internet connections can run independently on your watch.
After confirming eSIM profile, please touch Next to configure the watch. During this process, your network provider may require you to enter a confirmation code.

Your gender, height, weight, and age will be used to accurately calculate data such as how many calories you\'ve burnt. This will allow for more personalised services.
Warn when heart rate is higher than the upper limit
%1$s of maximum heart rate (220 - age). For example, Xiao Ming is 20 years old so his optimal exercise heart rate is %2$s to %3$s of 220-20, that is 120 to 160 (unit: beats/min).

%1$s %2$s: explosive training heart rate interval. During this period of rapid lactic acid accumulation, there is a high risk of injury, therefore, the duration of explosive training should be strictly controlled. Exercise types include sprinting.
%1$s %2$s: anaerobic endurance heart rate interval for faster training to improve fitness. Exercise types include tempo or intermittent running.
%1$s %2$s: aerobic endurance heart rate interval for endurance training to improve aerobic fitness and increase lung capacity and control of breathing rhythm. Exercise types include easy runs.
%1$s %2$s: fat-burning heart rate interval for improving basic physical condition to increase calories burned and cardiovascular regulation. Exercise types include jogging.
%1$s %2$s: warm-up heart rate interval for basic warm ups before exercise. Exercise types include brisk walking.
A regimen based on heart rate interval training is more effective.

Your fitness and health data will be automatically synced to the cloud, allowing your device to provide a more complete record of your fitness activities and more accurate data analysis services. Syncing requires Internet access, and data usage fees may apply.

Thank you for using Huawei Wear. In order to improve the user experience, you are invited to participate in the Huawei Wear User Experience Improvement Project (hereinafter known as the Project). Please note that your participation in the Project is completely voluntary. If you choose to participate, please read the Privacy Notice. Participation in the Project indicates that you accept this Privacy Notice and agree to the collection of the following data from your device for Huawei to analyse:
(1) Your device\'s MAC address, configuration data, app data, user behaviour data, device status data, and error logs.
(2) Your data will be transmitted through a secure channel to Huawei. Huawei will collect and analyse all the data in order to improve Huawei\'s products, services, and user experience.
(3) To start or stop participating in the Project, you can enable or disable the collection and transfer of your data in app settings.

(4) Data collected from your device will be stored in a secure cloud environment. This data will only be accessed for the purposes of the Project. Data transmission shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding privacy and data protection.
(5) When Huawei has finished analysing the data, all data collected will be deleted.
Huawei will treat any data collected from your device with strict confidence. Read the Huawei Privacy Policy for more information on how Huawei protects your data, identity, and privacy.

Thank you for choosing Huawei Wear. In order to improve user experience, Huawei would like to invite you to join the Huawei Wear User Experience Improvement Plan (the Plan). Your participation in the Plan is entirely voluntary. If you choose to join, please read this Privacy Notice carefully.

Huawei would like to collect information about usage of Huawei Wear app through Google Analytics. No personally identifiable information will be sent to Google. Huawei will get anonymous usage data from Google. Please find more information about Google Analytics at www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/. Joining the Plan indicates your acceptance of this Privacy Notice and consent to the collection of the following data from your device for analysis purposes:
(1) Your device configuration data, app statistics, user behaviour data, device state data and error log data.
(2) You may choose to join or leave the Plan at any time by enabling or disabling the collection and transfer of your data in Settings.
Huawei will treat any data collected from your device with strict confidence. Read the Huawei Privacy Policy for more information on how Huawei protects your data, identity and privacy.
